summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 12, 2020, discussing media presence at the FBI Miami office related to an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) victim briefing in the Epstein case. The correspondence involves FBI personnel coordinating responses and referring press inquiries to the DOJ.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The sender of the initial FYI email, notifying colleagues about press presence at the FBI Miami office for an Epstein OPR victim briefing. Works in the FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit.

events.title: Epstein OPR Victim Briefing at FBI Miami
events.description: An Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) victim briefing related to the Epstein case was scheduled to occur at the FBI Miami office, attracting press attention.

keyFacts: On November 12, 2020, press was gathered outside the FBI Miami office regarding an Epstein-related OPR victim briefing.
The FBI was aware of the event and planned to refer media calls to the Department of Justice (DOJ).
The DOJ was expected to release a report related to the briefing, but the specific timeline was unclear.
The correspondence involves the FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit.
The document indicates ongoing internal coordination within the FBI regarding public communication on the Epstein investigation.
